snippet: Henrik Kristoffersen of Norway won a men’s World Cup slalom in Kranjska Gora, Slovenia, while Hirscher recovered from a disappointing first run to place sixth and extend his lead in the standings.
abstract: Henrik Kristoffersen of Norway wins men's World Cup slalom in Kranjska Gora, Slovenia; other skiing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Henrik Kristoffersen of Norway won a men’s World Cup slalom in Kranjska Gora, Slovenia, while Hirscher recovered from a disappointing first run to place sixth and extend his lead in the standings.
